import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useEffect } from "react" import { getAllG } from "../axios/gemaAxios" import { loadGame } from "../redux/actions/gameAction" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" export const ListGame = () => { let lgame=useSelector(p => p.datareucerg.games) let dg = useDispatch() const n=useNavigate() useEffect(() => { debugger if (lgame != null && lgame.length == 0){ getAllG() .then((x) => dg(loadGame(x.data))) .catch((err) => console.log(err))} }, []) return {lgame.map((x, i) => ( ))}
קוד שם משחק
{x._id} {x.GameName} {x.Price} {x.age} {x.codeC} {x.img}
